name: Space Wave (Seet)
description:
Made for the Game Maker Space Mods: Holiday Community Competition, a competition based on creating a recognisable modification of the GMS 2 Space Mods tutorial which is based off the retro game Asteroids.

Space Wave

Asteroids but with an 80's retro synthwave neon look too it, coupled with awesome synthwave music, juicy effects, powerups and really tough boss! The boss appears after Wave 5. Can you defeat it?

#GMSpaceMods
